name: Intune Baselines
description: Intune Baselines provides curated JSON Intune profiles that implement CIS, compliance, and security baselines across Windows, macOS, iOS/iPadOS, Android, and enterprise apps. Built from best practices, Zero Trust concepts, and official CIS benchmarks, these profiles are designed for rapid import into Intune (via Micke-K's IntuneManagement tool). Regularly updated, they support scalable Modern Workplace deployments and testing in diverse environments.
author: Jan Mulder
